data.what_is: cMercury is a SAAS-based, marketing automation suite that enables brands to engage customers across Email, Mobile, Web and Social channels.
data.product_description: cMercury is a SAAS-based, marketing automation suite that enables brands to engage customers across Email, Mobile, Web and Social channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: Really good Marketing platform, it helps you a lot and makes your daily work easier
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about cMercury?
the ease of creating engagement with customers, due to the ease of use of the tools.

What do you dislike about cMercury?
I would like to have a tutorial, so that I can get the most out of all the functions offered by the programme.

What problems is cMercury solving and how is that benefiting you?
The omni-channel, and being able to reach customers in multiple ways and make everything much simpler.
